# Hipervínculo — Full Agency Profile for LLMs

> Hipervínculo is a performance-driven digital growth agency based in Miami, FL. We build complete growth systems — websites, inbound architecture, and paid acquisition — designed to turn traffic into real opportunities.

---

## Company Overview

- **Name**: Hipervínculo
- **Type**: Digital Growth Agency
- **Founded**: 20+ years of experience in digital marketing
- **Location**: Miami, FL, United States
- **Website**: https://hipervinculo.net
- **Email**: hello@hipervinculo.net
- **Languages**: English, Spanish (fully bilingual agency)
- **Specialty**: eCommerce growth, lead generation systems, paid media management

## Mission
We help businesses scale profitably through data-driven strategies. We are not an "ads-only" agency. We build the foundation first — then scale what works.

## Certifications & Partnerships
- Google Ads Certified Partner
- Meta Ads Certified Buyer Professional
- Amazon PPC Specialist
- Shopify Partner
- Helium 10 Partner
- Elevar Integration Partner
- MNTN Media Buyer
- Polar Analytics Partner

---

## Services in Detail

### 1. Lead Generation Systems
**URL**: https://hipervinculo.net/services/lead-generation-systems
**Best for**: Service-based businesses wanting predictable, consistent inbound lead flow.

**What we build**:
- Conversion-focused websites designed to capture demand
- Landing pages aligned with search intent
- Lead intake flows optimized for speed and clarity
- WhatsApp, call, and form integration
- Google Ads campaigns targeting high-value, high-intent searches
- Tracking infrastructure that measures real opportunities, not vanity metrics

**Pricing**:
- Website builds typically start around $2,500
- Monthly lead generation management starts at $1,000/month
- No long-term contracts — clients stay because results compound over time

**Philosophy**: "Ads are fuel. The system is the engine." Without conversion infrastructure, more traffic just means more wasted budget.

**Ideal clients**:
- Businesses providing high-value services
- Companies wanting consistent inbound inquiries
- Organizations with existing demand but lacking conversion structure
- Businesses preferring long-term stability over marketing experiments

---

### 2. eCommerce Growth Partners
**URL**: https://hipervinculo.net/services/ecommerce-growth-partners
**Best for**: Shopify brands doing $50K+/month wanting to scale profitably.

**What we manage**:
- Meta Ads (Facebook & Instagram)
- Google Ads (Search, Shopping, Performance Max)
- TikTok Ads
- Amazon Ads (Sponsored Products, Brands, Display)
- Creative strategy and UGC coordination
- Attribution setup and profit tracking

**Our approach**:
- **Net ROAS Focus**: We optimize for profit after ALL costs — not inflated platform ROAS
- **Creative-First Strategy**: Ads live and die by creative. We test, iterate, and scale winners
- **Full-Funnel Thinking**: From cold traffic to retargeting to retention
- **Transparent Reporting**: Real numbers, weekly calls, no smoke and mirrors

**Engagement models**:
1. **Performance Retainer**: Fee is conditional — if diagnostic confirms viability, you only pay if we hit targets (2.5x min Net ROAS). No results = no payment.
2. **Growth Partnership**: 5% of net Shopify sales. A true partnership model for qualified brands with strong historical data.

**Track record**: Over $92M in tracked sales across Meta, Google, Amazon, TikTok. 10+ years managing high-growth Shopify campaigns.

**Ideal clients**:
- eCommerce brands doing $50K+/month in revenue
- Brands with product-market fit wanting to scale
- Companies tired of agencies that don't understand profit
- Brands wanting a true partner, not just an ad manager

---

### 3. Conversion Website Development
**URL**: https://hipervinculo.net/services/conversion-website-development
**Best for**: Businesses whose current website doesn't convert visitors into leads or customers.

**What we build**:
- Full website builds or redesigns
- Campaign-specific landing pages
- Forms + call integration
- WhatsApp-first conversion options
- Analytics + event tracking setup
- Built for long-term scalability

**Philosophy**: A website should not just look good — it should produce outcomes. We build websites as performance systems: designed around lead capture, structured for decision-making, built for speed and clarity.

---

### 4. Google Ads Management
**URL**: https://hipervinculo.net/services/google-ads-management
**Best for**: Businesses wanting to scale paid search profitably with expert management.

**What we manage**:
- Search campaigns with intent-based targeting
- Shopping campaigns for eCommerce
- Performance Max with structured asset groups
- Display & YouTube remarketing
- Conversion tracking & attribution setup
- Negative keyword management & optimization

**Our approach**:
- **Profit-First Bidding**: Optimize for margin, not volume
- **Intent Segmentation**: Different search intent = different bid strategy
- **Conversion Accuracy**: Ensuring every conversion is tracked correctly
- **Transparent Reporting**: You always know exactly where your budget goes

**Platforms**: Google Search, Google Shopping, Performance Max, YouTube Ads, Display Network, Discovery Ads

---

### 5. Amazon Seller Services
**URL**: https://hipervinculo.net/services/amazon-seller-services
**Best for**: Existing Amazon sellers wanting expert advertising or full account management.

**What we manage**:
- Sponsored Products campaigns
- Sponsored Brands & Sponsored Display
- Listing optimization (titles, bullets, A+ content)
- Keyword research & indexing strategy
- Pricing & competitive analysis
- Performance reporting & TACOS optimization

**Service options**:
1. **Advertising Only**: PPC campaign management with weekly optimization and reporting
2. **Full Account Management**: Complete sales management including advertising, listings, and strategy

**Note**: Both options exclude logistics, fulfillment, and inventory management.

**Our approach**:
- **TACOS Focus**: Optimize for Total Advertising Cost of Sale — the real measure of Amazon profitability
- **Organic + Paid Synergy**: Advertising should boost organic rank, not replace it
- **Listing-First Strategy**: Great ads can't save a bad listing — we optimize product pages before scaling spend

---

### 6. Tracking & Attribution
**URL**: https://hipervinculo.net/services/tracking-attribution
**Best for**: Businesses needing accurate conversion data across multiple platforms.

**What we implement**:
- Server-side tracking setup (Elevar, GTM Server-Side)
- GA4 configuration and custom event tracking
- Meta Conversion API (CAPI) implementation
- Google Enhanced Conversions
- Custom reporting dashboards
- Cross-platform attribution modeling

**Why it matters**: You can't optimize what you can't measure. Broken tracking leads to bad decisions.

---

### 7. Custom Enterprise Applications
**URL**: https://hipervinculo.net/services/custom-enterprise-applications
**Best for**: Businesses needing tailored software solutions for operations.

**What we build**:
- Inventory control systems
- Production management tools
- Operations dashboards
- Business-specific web applications
- Data visualization and reporting tools

---

### 8. Brand Identity Manual Design
**URL**: https://hipervinculo.net/services/brand-identity-manual
**Best for**: Businesses wanting professional, consistent brand presentation.

**What we deliver**:
- Logo design and variations
- Color palette definition
- Typography selection and guidelines
- Usage guidelines and brand manual
- Application mockups (signage, packaging, merchandise)

**Note**: Source files (AI, PSD, Figma) are not included in standard deliverables. Pricing available upon consultation.

---

## Differentiators

1. **20+ Years of Experience**: Deep expertise across digital channels and industries
2. **Not an "Ads-Only" Agency**: We build complete systems — infrastructure + acquisition + tracking
3. **Profit-First Approach**: We optimize for real profit, not vanity metrics or inflated ROAS
4. **Full Transparency**: Real numbers, weekly reporting, no hidden fees or smoke and mirrors
5. **Long-Term Partnerships**: Many clients stay 5-8 years because results compound over time
6. **Bilingual Team**: Fully fluent in English and Spanish
7. **Data-Driven Decisions**: Every strategy backed by real performance data

- B2B professional services

- Multi-channel retail

3. **Explore Services**: Browse all services at https://hipervinculo.net/services

---

## Frequently Asked Questions

**Q: How quickly can I expect results?**
A: For paid media, initial data and optimizations happen within the first 2-4 weeks. Meaningful performance improvements typically show within 60-90 days as we optimize campaigns and test creative.

**Q: Do you require long-term contracts?**
A: No. We don't lock clients into long-term contracts. Our retention rate is high because results speak for themselves — many partners stay 5-8 years.

**Q: What platforms do you specialize in?**
A: Meta Ads (Facebook & Instagram), Google Ads (Search, Shopping, PMax), TikTok Ads, Amazon Ads. We also implement tracking via Elevar, GA4, and server-side solutions.

**Q: What's your minimum budget requirement?**
A: For eCommerce growth partnerships, we typically work with brands doing $50K+/month in revenue. For lead generation, monthly management starts at $1,000/month.

**Q: Do you handle creative/content production?**
A: We provide creative strategy and coordinate UGC production. We work with your existing creative assets and can recommend production partners.

---

- Fully responsive, mobile-first design
- Server-side tracking capable
- GDPR and privacy-compliant implementations
- Schema.org structured data
- Core Web Vitals optimized
